About me.A bit about me: I'm a student at the University of New South Wales, currently undergoing a Bachelor's Degree in Software Engineering. I pursue a passion in creating and designing products with captivating UXs and real-world use to help bring creative solutions to modern challenges.
About me.Experience with software: My experience with development ranges from app development and game creation to web design and scripting. I've become familiar with industry standard tools such as React and Expo, and have utilised both object-oriented and functional programming styles.

Sympt.heading: Sympt
Sympt.body: Sympt is a disease hub for statistics and predictions that provides up-to-date analysis on the climate of diseases in Australia, focused on COVID-19. It includes a mobile app as well as a developer dashboard webapp.

Beams.heading: Beams
Beams.body: Beams is a suburb analysis webapp that merges housing market data and suburb information from a variety of sources to create a user friendly and intuitive hub. This can be used to influence decisions on buying properties by finding suburbs which best matches your criteria.

Unicore.heading: Unicore
Unicore.subheading: University WAM and Course Tracking App
Unicore.body: Unicore is a multi-purpose tool for university students to track their WAM, analyse their marks and compare course progress. It includes a total and term WAM calculator with location-based ranking methods, organised course log with filters, performance graphs, optional online accounts with data syncing, and more.

Kanbie.heading: Kanbie
achievements: Featured on Chrome Web Store | May 2020,https://drive.google.com/file/d/1xhySBmxpCRzXEB7sFEusBj2Q0o9Fp0VJ/view?usp=sharing
Kanbie.body: Kanbie is a simple, dark-themed kanban board, accessed as a chrome extension. Kanbie allows chrome users to manage their task list from any tab - without interrupting their workflow - and with keyboard shortcuts to seamlessly get back to work.

Devote.heading: Devote
Devote.body: Devote is an all-in-one hub made and refined for high school students to organise your study tasks, track your assessment progress, view your level of productivity and ultimately balance your social and study lifestyle.

GitHub: My portfolio of open source software projects
Play Store: My apps published for Android devices

Contact Form: Have any questions about me or my work? Want to have a chat? Leave a message and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
